title: Language Instruction Design Workshop Utilizing Digital Games

context.prior_knowledge: Basic proficiency in digital tools and comprehension of foundational language education concepts
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented classroom environment utilizing digital devices and game development tools

learning_goals: Design and develop at least one type of digital game-based language learning content tailored to learners' proficiency levels
Apply the service-learning model to analyze educational requirements needed by actual language learners
Through iterative instructional design (ID), evaluate and improve the linkage between game mechanics and language learning objectives
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
